dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kanye West is actually meeting with Elaine Chao about a post-Covid curriculum for his new project.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kanye West is actually meeting with Elaine Chao about a post-Covid curriculum for his new project.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West says that hes designing a school within the next month and that Im meeting with Betsy DeVos about the post-Covid curriculum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, Elaine Chao? The Secretary of Transportation? That's uh, an interesting choice for an education meeting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, Elaine Chao? The Secretary of Transportation? That's uh, an interesting choice for an education meeting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he's still insisting he's "walking to win" the presidency, not running.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he's still insisting he's walking to win the presidency, not running.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Asked about that directly, West said that rather than running for president, he was walking, quickly adding that he was walking . . . to win.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, but he admitted he's trying to siphon votes from Biden, which is just wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, but he admitted he's trying to siphon votes from Biden, which is just wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And West was eager to criticize Biden, and expressed comfort with the idea of doing damage to the former vice presidents White House chances. Im not denying it; I just told you.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he called it a "God production," not a Kanye production, when asked about the sketchy ballot operation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he called it a God production, not a Kanye production, when asked about the sketchy ballot operation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When I pointed out to West that the slapdash operation to get him on the ballot, which includes one operative previously arrested for voter fraud and multiple West electors from the same address, didnt feel like a Kanye West production, West replied that it was a God production.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which, by the way, involves operatives with past voter fraud arrests—not exactly a clean look.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, by the way, involves operatives with past voter fraud arrests-not exactly a clean look.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When I pointed out to West that the slapdash operation to get him on the ballot, which includes one operative previously arrested for voter fraud and multiple West electors from the same address, didnt feel like a Kanye West production, West replied that it was a God production.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But he's still got this complicated relationship with Trump, even though he said he was "taking the red hat off."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But he's still got this complicated relationship with Trump, even though he said he was taking the red hat off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I am taking the red hat off, with this interview.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he criticized Trump a little but then praised him for letting God be part of the conversation. It's all over the place.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he criticized Trump a little but then praised him for letting God be part of the conversation. It's all over the place.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, he was reticent to criticize Trump besides that. Trump is the closest president weve had in years to allowing God to still be part of the conversation, he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And his wife Kim Kardashian has expressed concern about his mental health, given his bipolar disorder.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And his wife Kim Kardashian has expressed concern about his mental health, given his bipolar disorder.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Wests recent actions have also drawn public focus, given his bipolar disorderand many, including his wife, Kim Kardashian-West, have expressed concern about his mental health.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which makes the whole situation feel even more concerning, like, is he being used here?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which makes the whole situation feel even more concerning, like, is he being used here?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: He didn't really answer that, just doubled down on the spiritual angle—"Jesus is King" and all that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He didn't really answer that, just doubled down on the spiritual angle-Jesus is King and all that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: West did not respond when asked whether he feels hes being used.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he's never even voted before! Now suddenly he's got this Birthday Party platform with pro-life and anti-vaccine theories.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he's never even voted before! Now suddenly he's got this Birthday Party platform with pro-life and anti-vaccine theories.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a wide-ranging interview with Forbes last month about his political aspirations, West, who has never voted before, laid out a platform for his Birthday Party that included a pro-life plank that alleged that Planned Parenthood was placed in cities by white supremacists, a management style patterned on the fictional country of Wakanda in Black Panther and anti-vaccine conspiracy theories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a lot to unpack, and Republican operatives are pushing him in battleground states like Wisconsin.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a lot to unpack, and Republican operatives are pushing him in battleground states like Wisconsin.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Wests intentions have come under increased scrutiny this week, following reports by CNN, New York, the New York Times and others, about efforts by GOP political operatives to get him onto several ballots, including states like Wisconsin that could be pivotal in deciding the next president.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Meanwhile, Trump says he has nothing to do with it, but they've met before, so it's hard to believe there's zero coordination.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Meanwhile, Trump says he has nothing to do with it, but they've met before, so it's hard to believe there's zero coordination.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I like Kanye very much, President Trump told reporters at the White House yesterday. No, I have nothing to do with him getting on the ballot.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. This feels less like a real campaign and more like a chaotic sideshow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. This feels less like a real campaign and more like a chaotic sideshow.
